website_summaries.verdict: Those who are fans of classics will surely appreciate the Puma Turin shoes. Though it may not be as comfortable as the other Puma models and its width is too narrow for most of its buyers, many still appreciate its overall performance and especially its look.It is a sport-inspired kick that gives a Puma retro vibe with a modern approach. It can be worn with anything sporty or casual. What makes it even more appealing is its budget-friendly price tag.
pros: A large number of purchasers agree that the Puma Turin is an excellent shoe with a budget-friendly price tag
This Puma classic shoe is available in many color options and material variations
Many reviewers highly-recommend the Puma Turin shoes
Some of the Puma Turin reviews mention that purchasers appreciate the retro look and overall style of the shoe as it goes well with a wide range of clothing
The Puma Turin sneakers are incredibly lightweight, which please many reviewers
At least one reviewer emphasizes how durable this shoe is
A few numbers of reviewers appreciate that the shoe exactly looks just as good on actual as it is in the photos
cons: The majority of the reviewers say that the Puma Turin is not as comfortable as the other Puma models they own
Lots of reviewers say that the shoe is too narrow and a bit tight in the toe area
The tongue is too thin that always go off to the side, according to some purchasers

customer_reviews.title: ... quickly they looked knackered after a few weeks not good considering how expensive this brand can be
customer_reviews.text: The black leather wore away really quickly they looked knackered after a few weeks not good considering how expensive this brand can be. luckily I purchased these when they had gone down in price but I would not buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Isabell Moon

customer_reviews.title: Definable not the best Puma’s
customer_reviews.text: As an avid trainer enthusiast I wasnt to impressed with these. I have had lots of pairs of Puma’s over the years but unfortunately these didnt fit or look that great. They look quite bulky in size 10 and unlike other Puma’s the base was quite hard with very little flexibility. Returned and ordered some new Reebok Classics.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking trainers, ill fitting.
customer_reviews.text: iGood price for the Puma trainers, they are a little small for my feet, but still OK to wear. I've been reluctant for many years ordering clothes and footwear online due to this... guess I'll stick to shops.
customer_reviews.author: Maximuqq

customer_reviews.title: Puma Turin.
customer_reviews.text: The toe is tapered but is fairly comfortable, they dont squash your toes too much, although i have had the trainers on for a good few hours and my toes feel a little tingly. Hopefully after wearing them in that will disappear, but all in all they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Petesfeet

customer_reviews.title: Wearing through on the inside after a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: These are a good fit and comfortable, however they are already wearing through on the back of the heel after only a couple of weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Edington's This and That

customer_reviews.title: THE RIGHT SHOE IS TOO NARROW
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe is crushing my little toe , ive used a shoe streecher and it still kills , the left fits fine which is my bigger foot ? , I wouldnt be suprised if there fakes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Puma trainers
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding Puma trainers and are fairly moderate. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Hindley

customer_reviews.title: Classic puma trainers
customer_reviews.text: These are classic puma trainers and purchased at the lowest possible price. Bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D

customer_reviews.title: Hurrah!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and 'springy' feel to these trainers, nice smooth leather, and a bargain at £20. :-)
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... which happens with these types of shoes they are great for a pair of all round shoes and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Other than the creasing of the front which happens with these types of shoes they are great for a pair of all round shoes and was very impressed when using these to go out running.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 9. Bought a size 10. Size 9 was tight.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Amjad

product_meta.title: PUMA Turin Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Turin Trainers:The football-inspired PUMA Turin, with its soft upper and comfortable midsole, features a classic, timeless look. This silhouette will help you rock the streets and is perfect for the casual, day-to-day usage.
